p1: Chase & Hunt Consultancy is one of the leading and fastest growing executive search and recruitment firms based in Dubai. We help our clients find the best Human Capital for their business and our candidates better options to build their careers.
p2: We serve a multicultural client base and our clients include large multinational, and international companies, entrepreneur-led organizations and even small- and medium- sized enterprises. We have a global perspective and strong local knowledge to cater to all types of requirements across various industry segments.
p3: Our focus is to provide effective executive search and recruitment solutions to you.
p4: We believe in becoming a partner to cater to all your recruitment needs and blend in seamlessly with your existing HR and recruitment structure.
p5: When you engage us, your objectives become our objectives and our team will work with you to meet your deadlines and priorities.
p6: We offer our clients a competitive advantage in the marketplace by giving them the ability to rapidly acquire the best people, reduce operational costs and maximize opportunities.

h2: WHAT MAKES US A BETTER CHOICE?
h2p: We invest in long-term relationships, taking time and effort to gain a thorough understanding of each client's business goals and strategy, their position in the marketplace and business life-cycle, their competition and their culture. This helps us find you better people.
p1: • We focus on understanding your real needs and maximizing your reach by using our extended networks.
p2: • Put our efforts to save your time and give you a value addition.
p3: • Our team works with a belief that each client is unique and needs a customized level of service and solution.
p4: • We identify skills, competency and cultural requirements for a better fitment of employees
p5: • If required conduct further screening, testing and reference checking on selected candidates for a better fitment.
p6: • Believe in searching and filtering the right candidates for you rather than sending you a bulk CVs.
p7: • After selection, we even act as facilitators for hiring negotiations with the candidates for a smooth joining process.

h1: How can we add value to your organisation?
h2: The fact is , we know where and how to find the executives you need and how to attract the very best talent for your organization. This allows us to add real value to your recruitment and talent management objectives.
h2p: 1) Minimising your timeframes and lead time

h1: We add direct value to your business.
h2: Minimising your timeframes and lead time
p1: In a fast moving market place which has intense competition for attracting the best talent, you don’t want to waste time educating your search consultant on the realities of your business over extended meetings .
p2: We minimise the time and effort you need to explain and educate our serch consultants by collecting the most important facts and information from you and then use our inhouse research team to get detailed insights.

h1: We add direct value to your business.
p1: Most of our consultants have rich experience in various industry sectors and we also maintain a pool of true industry insiders who understand how things work in your world and help us find the right talent for you.
p2: Most of our consultants have rich experience in various industry sectors and we also maintain a pool of true industry insiders who understand how things work in your world and help us find the right talent for you.

h1: We add direct value to your business.
p1: Each time you engage us to search for human capital and talent for at any level in your organisation, you gain access to the expertise and market reach of all our consultants, not just the consultant you meet or talk over the phone.
p2: The power of this trusted network places the insight and resources of our entire firm at the disposal of the main consultant who works with you directly. This makes our recruiting solutions richer and more responsive, creating tangible business impact for you.

h1: We add direct value to your business.
p1: In addition to our inhouse consultants we also have a wide network of external consultants and headhunters who work for us from a variety of external locations.
p2: Most of them are industry professionals who have  a talent to identify and search the right people in their expert domains.

h1: We add direct value to your business.
p1: We also have a confidential network of associate companies which help us reach where our traditional network may not reach.
p2: This enables us to provide you a value addition for sourcing the best talent for your business in a cost effective environment.

h1: How do we find the right people for you ?
h2: Impactful executive search and recruitment methodology.

p1: We strive to know all we can about your organization to gain deep insight into what kind of employees will be most effective for you – right from the start and long term.
p2: We work with you to pinpoint the ideal candidate’s competencies, personality traits, and behavioral characteristics. This enables us to narrow our search and minimise time.

p1: With the objective well defined, our consultants personally and confidentially engage their local and international relationships to identify candidates prepared to meet your needs and connect you to highly diverse talent pools.
p2: With the objective well defined, our consultants personally and confidentially engage their local and international relationships to identify candidates prepared to meet your needs and connect you to highly diverse talent pools.
p3: Through this rigorous process, we closely examine candidates who appear to be a potential match, analyzing critical incidents in their careers for insights into how they might navigate the challenges they would face in your targeted role.

p1: Our consultants approach the best qualified candidates personally, quietly, and with great discretion. As our consultants move deeper into conversation with interested, well-qualified candidates, we conduct interviews which are tailor made as per the seniority and the type of roles.
p2: Our evaluation goes far beyond the customary professional track record check and referencing.
p3: We also check candidate’s range of capabilities, personal tendencies, and behavioral characteristics  and assess how smoothly they would integrate into your organization and culture.
p4: We understand well that eventually its not only about skill sets and qualilfications, its about fitting into your environement and delivering results

p1: After selection when we get into the hiring phase, we are thoroughly prepared to serve as problem solvers and facilitators.
p2: After selection when we get into the hiring phase, we are thoroughly prepared to serve as problem solvers and facilitators.
p3: Our objective is to work with you to help you attract top talent and to proactively build highly adaptive,and diverse people teams that are fully prepared to fulfill your strategic business objectives. We work with all nationalities and cultures and encourage a healthy mix of talent.

p1: We constantly track key trends in the global market for talent, and continually innovate our services and approaches.
p2: Most of all we value your relationship and your requirements and needs ultimately drive our processes.

p1: While we maintain a focus on ethics and rigor in our search process, our purposeful limited size means we can offer our clients the utmost in responsiveness, flexibility and, of course, agility! Our commitment to you is our knowledge, expertise and hard work, always with your interest put first.
